title: Greek language and people eps. 1-10
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Greece - Social life and customs
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Languages, Modern - Study and teaching
description: A ten part series serving as an introduction to the modern Greek langauge. for new students of the language and general tourists. Provides information regarding Greek culture and history including music, cuisine and local customs. The ten episodes are divided into: Ordering drinks, Ordering meals, Asking the way, Meeting people, Buying things, Getting around, Finding accomodation, Who's Who, Likes and dislikes and Revision. These tapes are also available as 2 seperate volumes under title codes 508627 & 508628.
related_objects: Title; 508627; Greek language and people. Episodes 1-5; Active; 1983
